title: Stana Katic
summary: Stana Katic (/ˈstɑːnə ˈkætɪk/;[2] Serbian Cyrillic: Cтaнa Катић, romanized: Stana Katić, pronounced [stǎːna kǎːtitɕ]; born (1978-04-26)26 April 1978[3][4]) is a Canadian-American actress and producer. She played Kate Beckett on the ABC television romantic crime series Castle (2009–2016) and Agent Emily Byrne in the thriller series Absentia (2017–2020).[5]
